
PATHOPHYSIOLOGY
vWF acts as a linker between
platelets and endothelium and also serves as car
rier for factor VIII. Thus, vWD deficiency may lead
to decrease in factor VIII levels
Inheritance
Pathophysiology

platelets
IIN
Autosomal recessive
# vWF affinity for factor VIII, similar to hemophilia
III
Autosomal recessive
Complete absence of vWF


platelet disorder with bruising,
skin or mucosal bleeding, and heavy menstrual
cycles for most subtypes, except type IIN which
manifests as hemophilia with soft tissue, joint, and
